Title: Home
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), Dave Hill (written for television by)
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey, Kit Harington
Plot: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven. Tommen meets with Cersei. Tyrion makes a bold move. Theon leaves while at Pyke new issues arise. Ramsay's brother is born. Davos asks Melisandre for a miracle.
